data.meta_description: Cybereason is on fire right now & we are just getting started so a great time to join!!We are hiring looking for a Channel Sales person for the UK !!!ðŸš€ðŸ¦‰
data.text:
I was asked this week if the Tandem Cyber Solutions Independent Sales Rep role could be done on the side. The answer is a resounding YES! It can be done fulltime but we imagined it being a role where people grow into it because a sales network takes a while to build. We have taken several steps to help speed up the process of building up a viable sales pipeline. 1.We have a sales academy for anyone new to sales. 2.We let our reps continue getting commissions year after year from their clients they bring in (yes this is unusual). 3.We meet with our reps regularly to answer questions and talk about our services. 4.We have a chat where everyone can share information and help each other So yea part time is a thing and it is encouraged.

#hiring *Regional Channel Manager (Remote - West)*, Los Angeles, *United States*, fulltime #jobs #jobseekers #careers #LosAngelesjobs #Californiajobs #SalesMarketing *Apply*: https://lnkd.in/gPR2ph72 Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks Taegis , a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world detection data, security operations expertise, and threat intelligence and research. Taegis is embedded in the security operations of over 4,000 organizations around the world who use its advanced, AI-driven capabilities to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We put the security in operations by delivering solutions that are purpose-built to secure your mission.We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about "what's next." We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team.Role OverviewThe Channel Sales Manager, covering East US, will work in tandem with peer field sales teams and focus Partners to drive incremental business and net new logo acquisition.Role ResponsibilitiesConsistently meet sales quotaRecruit and actively manage key Partners that meet Program criteriaEstablish business plan with focus Partners headquartered in regionEnsure adequate territory coverage by Partners for Secureworks sellersDrive consistent incremental ACV through each PartnerManage performance of each Partner according to partnership goals and KPIsOwn oversight of sales & technical enablement of PartnersProvide insight and thought leadership to Partners for distribution and advancement of sales opportunitiesAlign with key Alliance Partners to evangelize bundles and complementary offerings within key PartnersOwn weekly pipeline reporting by PartnerCoordinate customer-facing events with partners to develop leads and pipeline; report on event lead outputRun QBRs with top 3 incremental revenue-producing PartnersMaintain mastery of Secureworks offerings, presentations through formal sales certificationRequired SkillsMinimum of 7 years of sales experience (Channel, Partner, Distribution)Minimum of 3 years of cyber security experienceMSFT Office (Excel, Powerpoint), Excellent written and verbal communication Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Secureworks are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, natio

#hiring *Regional Channel Manager (Remote - West)*, San Diego, *United States*, fulltime #jobs #jobseekers #careers #SanDiegojobs #Californiajobs #SalesMarketing *Apply*: https://lnkd.in/d5z8Aftd Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks Taegis , a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world detection data, security operations expertise, and threat intelligence and research. Taegis is embedded in the security operations of over 4,000 organizations around the world who use its advanced, AI-driven capabilities to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We put the security in operations by delivering solutions that are purpose-built to secure your mission. We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about "what's next." We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team. Role Overview The Channel Sales Manager, covering East US, will work in tandem with peer field sales teams and focus Partners to drive incremental business and net new logo acquisition. Role ResponsibilitiesConsistently meet sales quotaRecruit and actively manage key Partners that meet Program criteriaEstablish business plan with focus Partners headquartered in regionEnsure adequate territory coverage by Partners for Secureworks sellersDrive consistent incremental ACV through each PartnerManage performance of each Partner according to partnership goals and KPIsOwn oversight of sales & technical enablement of PartnersProvide insight and thought leadership to Partners for distribution and advancement of sales opportunitiesAlign with key Alliance Partners to evangelize bundles and complementary offerings within key PartnersOwn weekly pipeline reporting by PartnerCoordinate customer-facing events with partners to develop leads and pipeline; report on event lead outputRun QBRs with top 3 incremental revenue-producing PartnersMaintain mastery of Secureworks offerings, presentations through formal sales certification Required SkillsMinimum of 7 years of sales experience (Channel, Partner, Distribution)Minimum of 3 years of cyber security experienceMSFT Office (Excel, Powerpoint), Excellent written and verbal communication Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Secureworks are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, nation

5 of the last 6 cyber sales candidates I have placed during my time at Intaso have joined their previous companies direct competition. In previous years it was common to see a high performing sales person secure a move to a vendor in a completely different area of tech. As we all know, a great solution sales person with plenty of drive should be able to sell anything. Yet hiring managers seem to be under more pressure than ever to get fast results which leads to a tendency to bring in so called 'known quantities' from their space. My advice to sales people who are currently looking for work - 1) Spend time curating a list of companies that are closely aligned to what you have sold in your last 1-3 roles. 2) Be prepared to speak in detail about deals you have recently won in this space. You may have competed with the business you are interviewing with and won! 3) You may need to do more than just send your CV to an online portal to get an interview. If your trusted recruitment partners can't get you in front of them, be prepared to pick up the phone and contact the hiring manager yourself. Leverage internal champions where possible. There is a ton of opportunity in the cyber job market right now. But in order to stand out from the crowd, make sure to be strategic about your approach.
